package.description: Fast pose estimation and object recognition system from a single RGBD image, in C++. Original code from Alvaro Collet, magically optimized and speeded up by Manuel Martinez, and extended to RGBD by David Fouhey
package.author: David Fouhey (dfouhey@cs.cmu.edu), Alvaro Collet (alvaro.collet@gmail.com), Manuel Martinez (salutte@gmail.com), Siddhartha Srinivasa (siddhartha.srinivasa@intel.com)
